features: SOFT BRISTLE TOOTHBRUSH Dr Plotka’s toothbrush is quite simply the BEST.BRUSH.EVER! The extra soft, multi-layered bristles break up plaque and sweep away food and residue that other brushes miss - leaving your teeth looking bright and feeling noticeably cleaner, every time you brush. Pair with Dr Plotka’s All Natural Whitening Toothpaste for the ultimate brushing experience!

SILVER TOOTHBRUSH Each polyester bristle is infused with silver, which naturally eliminates the buildup and debris that linger on most toothbrushes. Within 6 hours of using your brush, it’s fresh and clean, and ready for your next use. Happy brushing!

FLOSSING TOOTHBRUSH The tip of each flossing bristle is one micron, the thickness of a single human hair. These long, soft, floss-like bristles are 10X thinner than other bristles and reach between teeth, under the gum line, and deep into the grooves where most cavities form – better than any other toothbrush you will find!

SENSITIVE TEETH AND GUMS Soft polyester bristles are super gentle, perfect for sensitive teeth and gums. Polyester bristles are also longer lasting than traditional nylon bristles, so you can hold on to your brush for up to 4 months – 1 month longer than the typical toothbrush.

MOUTHWATCHERS was founded over 15 years ago by Dr. Ronald Plotka, DDS, a nationally renowned dentist with over 40 years of dentistry leadership. Dr. Plotka is dedicated to making life healthier with unique dental hygiene products that combine superior quality with the very latest technology – and guaranteed results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I’ve ever used!!
reviews.reviewText: Probably the single best toothbrush I’ve ever used. So much so that even though I’ve only had it a couple of days, I just ordered another set just to be sure I have plenty! My teeth are cleaner (less plaque, more white) than ever before and feel cleaner and gums full massaged like never before! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: I have to use an extra soft toothbrush because of my recessed teeth and sensitive gums. This toothbrush is even softer but even more effective. It gets particles of food out even after I have used floss. Where has this brush been all my life? I will never use another brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps teeth clean with braces!
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite toothbrushes! After getting braves, I wanted to find every option to keep my teeth as clean as possible. I bought a water flosser and stumbled upon these and switched over to use them instead of my normal toothbrush. I feel like these get everything much cleaner and they help get into all the crevices and everything. A couple months after I started using them, I had a dental cleaning appointment and the hygienist complimented how clean my teeth were! She said I had the "cleanest braces teeth she has ever seen". So the cleaning she did was minimal. Needless to say, I think these brushes helped me to do that. I've even converted my husband! As an awesome bonus, these are cruelty free. Sounds like a small thing, but the major dental care brands all still test on animals. I vow to never buy another product that isn't cruelty free. So that gives these bonus points.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars hurt at first but they're good
reviews.reviewText: This brush hurt to use a little bit at first but now I love it. My dentist and hygienist said my teeth and gums look healthy. Gives that really clean feeling/texture as if you've just had your teeth professionally cleaned. Very satisfying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best toothbrush I have ever used. It leaves your teeth feeling like you just got a cleaning. Only thing I don't like is the color of the bristles. The yellow color makes the toothbrush look dirty and old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teeth feel so clean!
reviews.reviewText: My mom introduced me to these toothbrushes. She kept raving about them but I didn’t understand how they could be so good. She was right! The bristle texture is just perfect and is shaped in a way that the bristles fit into all of the cracks and corners and clean so well. I also love that they’re infused with silver to kill germs between uses. The whole family loves them so this multipack is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrushes I have ever used
reviews.reviewText: I have an electric toothbrush that I use, but there are times I want to quickly brush my teeth and be done with it. And being honest, I don't floss as much as I should. I decided to try these toothbrushes and they really do help get between the teeth. I have 2 teeth that food tends to get stuck between (sorry, know that is gross), and regular brushing does not get the food out. I have to floss to remove the food. These toothbrushes DO work at getting stuff stuck between my teeth. And my teeth feel like I used my electric toothbrush after brushing with this toothbrush. I've never used any other toothbrush that made my teeth feel so clean. I had a dentist appointment this week and my hygienist commented that I must be doing a better job of flossing, because my teeth looked great and there wasn't a lot of tartar or plaque build-up. Nope! Didn't floss any more than normal. Just used these toothbrushes. So after getting the good check-up from my hygienist I will continue to buy and use these toothbrushes. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice manual toothbrush. I especially like the antibacterial properties. Will buy again.
Commande effectuée le 3 janvier 2024 et reçue le 10 janvier avec 2 brosses à dents manquantes. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A fabulous quality toothbrush I recently discovered.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these brushes some weeks ago,and have been monitoring it.I am delighted with its cleaning ability,and the capacity to leave flossing altogether as the bristles are so fine,and easily fit between my teeth.My teeth genuinely feel so much cleaner,and the brushes are excellent for brushing my gums,without damaging them.It is so gratifying to buy products that are excellent for their chosen purpose--and this is one of them.I strongly recommend Dr.Plotka's toothbrushes.
Happy with these toothbrushes, very soft and toothbrushes arrived quickly and in perfect condition
I'm very glad I bought these toothbrushes. Not certain I'd go back to the others I've used before as these ones really clean my teeth fully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with these toothbrushes. I do unfortunately have gum disease and see a Hygienist regularly, but I could never seem to find a toothbrush I was happy with. I did a search for toothbrushes for gum disease and these came up. They are brilliant and my mouth feels so clean after using them. They are impregnated with silver to combat bacteria. And they are the correct consistency fir the gums. A good size for the job too. Not too big and not to narrow.Will always buy these now.
